abstract: The New York Stock Exchange, Nasdaq and BATS Global Markets said in separate statements that they have agreed to close, after consulting with other exchanges and clients.
snippet: The New York Stock Exchange, Nasdaq and BATS Global Markets said in separate statements that they have agreed to close, after consulting with other exchanges and clients.

headline.main: Storm Forces Markets to Remain Closed
headline.print_headline: Storm Forces Markets to Remain Closed

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
